page.title: 04TRAFFIC PROBLEMS OF NORWICH
page.content: { For many years Norwich has had {severe}traffic problems such as congestion at roundabouts and major junctions. To overcome these problems several ideas have beens developed.An{Inner {Ring Road}was built comprising of a {flyover,roundabouts}at the principal junctions and{dual carriageway}roads.A {one-way system}was introduced but this led to greater congestion at some roundabouts.To combat this,{traffic {lights}were added at the roundabouts. { Television cameras}keep a watchful eye on the traffic flow and observers use this information to program a computer which is linked to a traffic light control.
